title: Phyna4
author: Phyna4
content: Spend time on things or activities that will change your life positively. Arrange your finance, invest and save wisely.Stop wasting your time on Social media solely to view and comment on pictures only. Invest in something today

comments.author: Raceonsucced
comments.body: Yes you're right. because time is gold. better fill time with useful things, not just lazy.there are many people who regret spending their time in the past, with nothing to benefit them in the future. so, before we regret and just keep quiet, it's better to use the time with something useful for the future.doing nothing will get you nowhere.

comments.author: Spaceman1000$
comments.body: Time is money, in the affair's of life every second counts.Wasting your time on frivolities, is not in the best interest of any individual. Social media has its own positive side, but I believe some persons use it negatively, you can spend precious hour's on social media without knowing how far you've gone. This are precious lost times that cannot be regained.  So let's learn how to be focused on goals and not be distracted.

comments.author: BADecker
comments.body: Don't waste your time. Except if you waste it on Nexus.io.Quote from: https://www.nexus.io/Nexus is a next-generation blockchain technology that is re-building the internet from the ground up.You can reserve and use a spot that is changing the world. Join.Note that this is something different than IPFS, which allows you to place your info on their site, and it can never be taken down. Why not? Because your info is encrypted, and it is stored all over the Internet in pieces. You'd have to shut down all or most of the Internet to take it down.Quote from: https://ipfs.tech/IPFS powers the Distributed Web---------A peer-to-peer hypermedia protocoldesigned to preserve and grow humanity's knowledgeby making the web upgradeable, resilient, and more open.

comments.author: HajiBagi
comments.body: Good advice buddy, I think looking at and commenting on social media pictures is just a waste of time because ever since I joined learning about bitcoin, I don't have time for social media like before again and that's very interesting to me the way I started live my life, time wait for nobody because if you don't have money, no one is going to love you the way you want, so my advice for new forum members like me is that take anything that worries about investing seriously.

comments.author: Phyna4
comments.body: Quote from: BADecker on January 25, 2023, 05:44:15 PMDon't waste your time. Except if you waste it on Nexus.io.Quote from: https://www.nexus.io/Nexus is a next-generation blockchain technology that is re-building the internet from the ground up.You can reserve and use a spot that is changing the world. Join.Note that this is something different than IPFS, which allows you to place your info on their site, and it can never be taken down. Why not? Because your info is encrypted, and it is stored all over the Internet in pieces. You'd have to shut down all or most of the Internet to take it down.Quote from: https://ipfs.tech/IPFS powers the Distributed Web---------A peer-to-peer hypermedia protocoldesigned to preserve and grow humanity's knowledgeby making the web upgradeable, resilient, and more open. thanks for this. I've join Nexus group on facebook. Will download the app to learn more.

comments.author: letteredhub
comments.body: Quote from: Phyna4 on January 25, 2023, 01:39:20 PMSpend time on things or activities that will change your life positively. Arrange your finance, invest and save wisely.Stop wasting your time on Social media solely to view and comment on pictures only. Invest in something todayIt's a good thing to invest not just our finances but also our time in something useful and worthy of time consuming. Social media isn't all that a waste of time for some persons, especially for the social media influencers, bloggers, and others that uses it as a means of advertising their products and services, only that a majority misuses the purpose of social media and it looks as if it's a time waster avenue for certain persons.

comments.author: Zlantann
comments.body: Quote from: Phyna4 on January 25, 2023, 01:39:20 PMSpend time on things or activities that will change your life positively. Arrange your finance, invest and save wisely.Stop wasting your time on Social media solely to view and comment on pictures only. Invest in something todayI was promoting a product on one of these social media platforms last year and it exposed me to the dangers of social media. Social media is the number one global time waster among youths and others. Although there are some positive effects of using social media but without discipline, one can waste his precious time on irrelevant things because most information on social media are either false or for just entertainment.I have always told youths around me to maximize thier time because when an opportunity is lost, it can never be regained. We must ensure that we only spend our time on things that would benefit us positively. Social media can be used to learn diverse skill, acquire a certification or even used for business or charity. But using the social media for just entertainment is time wasting and this habit must be controlled.

comments.author: Frankolala
comments.body: Social media is a waste of time and resources but so many people wouldn't see it from this perspective. I remembered when I was new into FB ,I spend so much of my time looking at pictures and comments on post of a friend,unknowingly to me that it was a waste of time.The funny thing in these social medias of a thing,if you don't discipline yourself on it,before you know it you might end up spending so much hours thinking that you are having fun on looking at pictures and comments. When I realized all these,I don't spend much time on it anymore. Time waits for man,so use it wisely by engaging yourself in what will add value to you.

comments.author: Smartvirus
comments.body: People surf the Web or social media for various purpose. Yeah, for someone like yourself @OP and very much me, it's  a typical waste of my time but there are those who don't see it that way. Besides, they've got such hours to spare and one can't go about working or being engaging in what would earn him money all through life. There is room for relaxation, amusement, fun, hubbies and whatever is out there and some of that, you ca find on social media.The bulk of time spent there by some users could be due to building a channe that could be used in some active communication which could benefit them. That way, you just might not be wasting some good quality time.When it is otherwise, when you come to surf the social media without a goal and you end up spending hours of your time, you just might be doing it completely wrong.

comments.author: KupaCrypto
comments.body: Social media waste time but this generation is too blind to see it,  you spend quality time on social media without getting tired or even feeling sleepy but the moment you try to do something tangible with your time boom sleep comes, the body is tired, Social media is all about the show u lifestyle and it only benefits the celebrities that use it to make money, So social media is a perfect example of someone wasting his time and even data for irrelevant things, because it's more about fun than what will benefit the individual.

comments.author: Alabodede23
comments.body: You are so right because time once lost  cannot be regained. The concept of time should be taught in schools so everyone realizes what a scarce commodity it is lookup.ng

comments.author: Asiska02
comments.body: OP, well said. But do you believe that the current transitional trend in today's world can cause people to divert their attention away from social media? I can only say that it can be reduced to a bare minimum but not completely stopped. Those who have experienced this type of scenario are mostly unproductive and could spend the entire day on social media viewing and following other people's success and trends. In my opinion, such people require total rehabilitation.

comments.author: Lordhermes
comments.body: Quote from: Phyna4 on January 25, 2023, 01:39:20 PMSpend time on things or activities that will change your life positively. Arrange your finance, invest and save wisely.Stop wasting your time on Social media solely to view and comment on pictures only. Invest in something today Op, you're making money from social Media. Instead of advocating people from social media, encourage them to use the social media for their gain and make cash from it. For me I do my businesses online and make my money here, when people see me pressing my phone always, they think am not a serious person. The world is changing and we have to develop ourselves to be part of it. Social media has changed so many people from grass to grace, for those that ultilise it.

comments.author: Ultegra134
comments.body: Quote from: Lordhermes on January 28, 2023, 06:28:34 AMQuote from: Phyna4 on January 25, 2023, 01:39:20 PMSpend time on things or activities that will change your life positively. Arrange your finance, invest and save wisely.Stop wasting your time on Social media solely to view and comment on pictures only. Invest in something today Op, you're making money from social Media. Instead of advocating people from social media, encourage them to use the social media for their gain and make cash from it. For me I do my businesses online and make my money here, when people see me pressing my phone always, they think am not a serious person. The world is changing and we have to develop ourselves to be part of it. Social media has changed so many people from grass to grace, for those that ultilise it.Life doesn't have to revolve around making money; social media can be used in moderation for communication, information, and entertainment purposes. Unfortunately, it's not easy to contain yourself from overusing social media; I continuously catch myself killing way too much time on them. One of my largest regrets is not taking advantage of the free time I had during the Covid-19 quarantines. Free time was almost infinite, and I spent most of it watching TV series and movies when I could have started learning a new foreign language or taking up a hobby. The most productive thing I did was rejoin BitcoinTalk and cryptocurrencies, and I'm thankful for it.

comments.author: Alisha-k
comments.body: Watching pictures and videos on social media during spare time isn't bad. It only becomes a problem when it start showing signs of addiction, If i must spend my time on social Media it should be paying for every time i visit it. It must not be heavy pay but it should be enough to pay for every data spent and pay for subscriptions if needed.

comments.author: Minecache
comments.body: Quote from: Zlantann on January 26, 2023, 10:40:19 PMQuote from: Phyna4 on January 25, 2023, 01:39:20 PMSpend time on things or activities that will change your life positively. Arrange your finance, invest and save wisely.Stop wasting your time on Social media solely to view and comment on pictures only. Invest in something todayI was promoting a product on one of these social media platforms last year and it exposed me to the dangers of social media. Social media is the number one global time waster among youths and others. Although there are some positive effects of using social media but without discipline, one can waste his precious time on irrelevant things because most information on social media are either false or for just entertainment.I have always told youths around me to maximize thier time because when an opportunity is lost, it can never be regained. We must ensure that we only spend our time on things that would benefit us positively. Social media can be used to learn diverse skill, acquire a certification or even used for business or charity. But using the social media for just entertainment is time wasting and this habit must be controlled.It depends on how you use social networks, many people can make money from social networks and even have a desirable passive income. Social media is not a time-wasting tool, you are wasting your time. Social networks, bitcoin... all are man-made products, and you use them for what you decide, it's useless to you, doesn't mean it's useless to others. Maybe you don't believe me, but my neighbor girl, who is only 18 years old, can earn 2000k$ per month by using TikTok every day. That is the dream income of both me and you.

comments.author: Stepstowealth
comments.body: Quote from: Phyna4 on January 25, 2023, 01:39:20 PMSpend time on things or activities that will change your life positively. Arrange your finance, invest and save wisely.Stop wasting your time on Social media solely to view and comment on pictures only. Invest in something todayNot everyone waste their time on Social Media, Social Media has even actually opened doors of opportunity for many people, many people have benefited by becoming Social Media Influencers, Social Media Comedians, many people have met their destiny helpers via social media and even the information some people have gotten from social Media is what has changed their lives till date. So social media is not a waste of time to everyone, it depends on what you do with it.

comments.author: Hispo
comments.body: We can all agree that time is money or even more important than money. Since we can make money with our time, but we cannot buy time with our money.Still, even if one wanted to change one's habits to be more of a productive person, some people will find themselves no knowing where to go or what to do,specially in countries where the economy does not work properly, non-conventional context can't be approached through conventional techniques.Here do not have access to American stocks, for example, and some people are not able to save money even though they are educated and have degrees. OP, I think your advise is too general and shallow for many.

comments.author: Sakanwa
comments.body: In life and in every activity of man kine we believe in work with time but most people don't take it serious,they forget that they say that time is money.You don't need to wast anytime of your life for doing what would not bring a change in income for you.We should know that time is the source of wealth so you don't have to wast any second of it so as not missing out of what is bring joy on others in the society today.
